divs: Sighting Detailsok..it was by birthday..and i was summoned to come outside as usual..i was living in another two story apt out here at the time..so i went down the stairs..i thought i was going to see red or white lights streaking across the sky like a shhoting star again ( I always get those every year for my birthday) but it wasnt this time..it was a big black triangle..it came from the west going east..it had red lights on the bottom..if i had 3 latters and stacked them on my roof..i could have touched the bottom of that very annoying thing..it took about 20 mintues for itt to fly over my porch i was standing on..i just watched it fly off even though it was a stupid gift because i learned as a child that if i didnt accept a present,,,white people and lasrge animals and people made of light will come in my home..they scasred all my half sisters and half brother our entire childhood lives..any way about 20 mintues give or take a few..it took THAT to fly over ME then it came back about 10 mintues later..this time it came from the north and went west..i never told anyone..but im sure my neighbors have seen things..they follw me all my life..when i lived in macon cort apts my neigbor had called morehead city police department about a couple of years ago..i found out when people taling outside woke me..i looked out the window and there was 2 police cars and my neirbor mrs obra standing in front of the apt building across from me..i opened the window cause the police was pointing flash lights up on her roof..i heard mrs obra say while pointing to my apt.."it jumped from that roof to mine" anyway i open my window and asked the police what was going on..the woman said "nothing..she just heard a baby crying" i said..on the roof..then closed my window becase she insulted my intelligence..im going now..im hungry..it is now 7:50am..sometimes on my birthday i get a circle made of red and white lights that will come down and let me touch it..it wont hurt you..and sometimes energy streams that look like a long spiders webwill follw me places..even at home and at school at the college..at first i thought the enenrgy streaM WAS SPIDERS WEB..BUT WHEN I STAND IN THE MIDDLE OF A STREET OR FEILD THAT STREAM IS STILL COMING STRAIGHT DOWN from the sky next to me..very beautiful but also annoying..but i get stuff almost every week now not just on my birthday..my stepgad saw the large animals only when he yell or hit me they showed up..he stop sleeping or coming in the house i was raised in..my ex husband saw them too my ex boyfriends saw black shadows and one of them couldnt sleep in my apt unless he had the lights on and tv on..but dont worry..as long as you dont try to harm me..they will just let you see them but dont touch you..not scary ok..just annoying
Summary: flew very slowly over me and then again in plain sight..annoying
trends: There has been one other sighting in Newport
There were no other sightings in Newport on or around March 3rd 1997
This sighting has never been favorited.
